display_information.name: Time Bot
display_information.description: A Slack bot that shows current times across multiple timezones with /time command
display_information.long_description: Time Bot helps teams coordinate across timezones by showing current times in London, Barbados, and New York. Use /time command to get instant timezone information, or specify a country and time for precise conversions.

slash_commands.description: Show current times across multiple timezones
slash_commands.usage_hint: [country] [time] - Optional country and time for specific conversions
